description: This file defines an in-memory singleton repository for managing notes within an Android application. It provides functions for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, and exposes a LiveData stream of the current notes list.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: A singleton object serving as an in-memory repository for note data, providing methods to manipulate and observe the list of notes.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Returns a LiveData object containing the list of notes.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates and adds a new note with the specified title and content; returns the created note.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates the title and content of an existing note identified by id.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes a note from the repository based on its id.

methods.name: publish
methods.description: Posts the current list of notes to the LiveData stream to update observers.
